casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Patrick RYAN 366A10-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 13, 2019

Marilyn G. Ozer, Attorney at Law, William Massengale, Chapel Hill, For Ryan, Michael Patrick

Kelvin Atkinson, William Stevenson, Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant District Attorneys, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Locke Bell, Attorney at Law, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of February 2019 by Defendant to Correct Certificate of Service in Defendant-Appellee's Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of March 2019."
